g.title: SKILL_WORKFLOW
cluster_start
g.text: TRIGGER: Need to create or improve a skill

g.title: cluster_prepare
cluster_draft
cluster_review
Request for skill work
Is the use case clear?
Request for skill work->Is the use case clear?
Ask for concrete examples
Is the use case clear?->Ask for concrete examples
Is this a new skill?
Is the use case clear?->Is this a new skill?
Collect example scenarios/prompts
Ask for concrete examples->Collect example scenarios/prompts
Collect example scenarios/prompts->Is the use case clear?
Initialize skill scaffold
Is this a new skill?->Initialize skill scaffold
Load existing skill baseline
Is this a new skill?->Load existing skill baseline
Proceed to preparation
Initialize skill scaffold->Proceed to preparation
Load existing skill baseline->Proceed to preparation
Define target workflow (steps, prerequisites, gates, outputs)
g.text: Define target workflow (steps, prerequisites, gates, outputs)

g.title: Proceed to preparation->Define target workflow (steps, prerequisites, gates, outputs)
Are workflow steps imperative and executable?
g.text: Are workflow steps imperative and executable?

g.title: Define target workflow (steps, prerequisites, gates, outputs)->Are workflow steps imperative and executable?
Refine workflow steps
Are workflow steps imperative and executable?->Refine workflow steps
Define trigger scenarios in notes (2-3 should trigger, 2 should not)
g.text: Define trigger scenarios in notes (2-3 should trigger, 2 should not)

g.title: Are workflow steps imperative and executable?->Define trigger scenarios in notes (2-3 should trigger, 2 should not)
Refine workflow steps->Are workflow steps imperative and executable?
Is branching/loop logic non-obvious?
Define trigger scenarios in notes (2-3 should trigger, 2 should not)->Is branching/loop logic non-obvious?
Plan small DOT flowchart
Is branching/loop logic non-obvious?->Plan small DOT flowchart
Use markdown-only workflow
Is branching/loop logic non-obvious?->Use markdown-only workflow
Preparation complete
Plan small DOT flowchart->Preparation complete
Use markdown-only workflow->Preparation complete
Draft frontmatter (name + description only)
Preparation complete->Draft frontmatter (name + description only)
Encode trigger scenarios in description and usage guidance
g.text: Encode trigger scenarios in description and usage guidance

g.title: Draft frontmatter (name + description only)->Encode trigger scenarios in description and usage guidance
Draft imperative SKILL.md workflow
Encode trigger scenarios in description and usage guidance->Draft imperative SKILL.md workflow
Need references/assets/scripts?
Draft imperative SKILL.md workflow->Need references/assets/scripts?
Create or update references/assets/scripts
Need references/assets/scripts?->Create or update references/assets/scripts
Draft complete
Need references/assets/scripts?->Draft complete
Need external research to expand references?
g.text: Need external research to expand references?

g.title: Create or update references/assets/scripts->Need external research to expand references?
Use mcp-research skill to gather source-backed references
g.text: Use mcp-research skill to gather source-backed references

g.title: Need external research to expand references?->Use mcp-research skill to gather source-backed references
Need external research to expand references?->Draft complete
Use mcp-research skill to gather source-backed references->Create or update references/assets/scripts
Run scenario checks against realistic prompts
g.text: Run scenario checks against realistic prompts

g.title: Draft complete->Run scenario checks against realistic prompts
Scenario checks pass?
Run scenario checks against realistic prompts->Scenario checks pass?
Run functional checks against realistic prompts
g.text: Run functional checks against realistic prompts

g.title: Scenario checks pass?->Run functional checks against realistic prompts
Optimize draft (triggering, redundancy, disclosure, flowchart need)
g.text: Optimize draft (triggering, redundancy, disclosure, flowchart need)

g.title: Scenario checks pass?->Optimize draft (triggering, redundancy, disclosure, flowchart need)
Functional checks pass?
Run functional checks against realistic prompts->Functional checks pass?
Are resources appropriate and sufficient?
Functional checks pass?->Are resources appropriate and sufficient?
Functional checks pass?->Optimize draft (triggering, redundancy, disclosure, flowchart need)
Offload SKILL.md detail into references/assets/scripts
Are resources appropriate and sufficient?->Offload SKILL.md detail into references/assets/scripts
Skill optimized and ready
Are resources appropriate and sufficient?->Skill optimized and ready
Offload SKILL.md detail into references/assets/scripts->Optimize draft (triggering, redundancy, disclosure, flowchart need)
Optimize draft (triggering, redundancy, disclosure, flowchart need)->Run scenario checks against realistic prompts
